Journey

My journey into Data Science began during my bachelor's, sparked by the Cambridge Analytica news. This revelation during my undergraduate studies led me to the vibrant world of Data Science. Working as a data analyst opened my eyes to practical challenges and inspired me to pursue advanced knowledge through a Master's degree. At Indiana University, I embraced projects in Deep Learning and NLP.

Beyond data, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I like cooking, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology. When forced outdoors, I like to explore food from different cusines.
